SKT_FIRST.name: Thump! Thump! Smash!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color> from the caster.
description: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000048_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000048_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color> from the caster.

SKT_SECOND.name: Ritri Will Protect You!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Reduces the damage taken by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Reduces the damage taken by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000048_2_1]</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Thump! Thump! Thump! Smash!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Grants a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>. The barrier strength is proportional to the caster’s <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies. Grants a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000048_3_1] turns</color>. The barrier strength is proportional to the casterâs <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Action Points of the caster.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>2</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> from the caster.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000048_chain_1_1]</color> Action Points of the caster.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000048_backup_1_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000048_backup_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> from the caster.
